mapper.insert: INSERT INTO book (title, content, matchType, level, status, bookDate, teamGender, location_locationId, member_userId, bookTime) VALUES (#{title}, #{content}, #{matchType}, #{level}, #{status}, #{bookDate}, #{teamGender}, #{location_locationId}, #{userId}, #{bookTime})
mapper.select: select nickName from member where userId = #{userId}

SELECT m.userId, m.nickName, b.bookId, b.title, b.content, b.matchType, b.level, b.status, b.bookDate, b.bookTime, b.insertDatetime, b.teamGender FROM member m LEFT JOIN book b ON m.userId = b.member_userId WHERE b.bookId = #{bookId}

SELECT b.bookId, b.title, b.bookDate, b.bookTime, l.stadiumName, m.nickName, b.status, b.matchType, b.level, l.region FROM book b LEFT JOIN location l ON b.location_locationId = l.locationId LEFT JOIN member m ON b.member_userId = m.userId ORDER BY bookId DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE book SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, matchType = #{matchType}, level = #{level}, status = #{status}, bookDate = #{bookDate}, bookTime = #{bookTime}, teamGender = #{teamGender} WHERE bookId = #{bookId}
